## MemoryStatsMonitor.timeSinceLastGC() method

Get the time elapsed since the last GC event in milliseconds.

**Signature:**

```typescript
timeSinceLastGC(): number;
```

**Returns:**

number

Number of milliseconds since last GC, or Infinity if no GC has occurred
